## Available Data Sources (PLEIADES)

### Pléiades (Very High Resolution)
- [**0.5m × 0.5m**]{.blue2} spatial resolution
- 3 bands (RGB)
- Free archives, on-demand acquisition ([**6-8 months**]{.blue2} for a department)
- Image size: 1km² (2000 × 2000 pixels)

## Available Data Sources (Sentinel-2)

### Sentinel-2 (High Resolution)
- [**10m × 10m**]{.blue2} spatial resolution
- 13 spectral bands
- [**5-day revisit time**]{.orange}, free access
- Image size: 6.25 km² (250 × 250)
